entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deux-Montagnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
